definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: It was formed during the Yanshan movement of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 它是在燕山地殼運動時期形成的。

sentences.english: The changing rates of baselines reflected crustal motion of different sites.
sentences.chinese: 基線長度變化率反映了測站間的地殼運動情況。

sentences.english: Shifts in the Earth's crust pushed India into Asia, heaving up the Himalaya.
sentences.chinese: 地殼運動將印度推向亞洲，托起喜馬拉雅山。
